text: Planning a trip to London from June 12 to June 15. Booked flight and hotel today.
Yes, I sold one of my cars. I still have a Tesla Model 3 and a Range Rover.
My favorite restaurants: Chez Pierre, Saffron Lounge, and Onda Marina.
Added a note: need a London SIM card and a driver for the 13th.
Bought a Tesla Model 3 last year; gifting the old Honda to a friend.
Booked a table at Saffron Lounge for Friday. Loved the tasting menu there.
